data.title: People Are Nice
data.text: The people there are nice to you but they don't really go out of their way to help you. Just get to you when they can.

data.title: Late night bowling
data.text: We had a great time. There was a small wait for a lane no problem we spent some time in the arcade. Once lane was open was quick to get us in the table and chairs were all freshly cleaned. It was cosmic bowling which makes it a little more interesting under the backlights. Definitely will be back

data.title: Nice lanes, great bar.
data.text:
Most bowling alleys look and feel the same, and this one is no different. It was clean and the staff were pleasant. Their food looked average and their beer selection on tap is wonderful. The arcade is large in size and had plenty of games for the kids.

No complaints, just nothing that sets it apart from every other alley in slc area.

I am a twice a year bowler, so by no means a lane or ball expert, maybe their lane quality and house ball selection best the competition, but I couldn't tell you :)
